string.value: Looks like Elpam is celebrating a new holiday. I should head over to New Leaf City and check it out!

Elpam is celebrating the holiday known as Versalmas! He'd like me to speak with O-Pongo, the Versalmas Mouse, and the one who gives presents. Looks like Elpam has received his gift from O-Pongo, who is also in New Leaf City, so doing this shouldn't be too tough...

Elpam offered me a slab of #bMelting Cheese#k as a Versalmas gift! Er, a strange gift but I gladly accepted this as a token of friendship! He also said that I should speak with O-Pongo to learn more about this Versal tradition...
Why, thank you! Happy Versalmas to you, too!
Speaking of Versalmas, I have something for you too. Talk to me again while I get it for you.
Please, take this to celebrate the 30 Days of Delight! I'm sorry it's not the kind made by the famous Versalian fragrancier, Dr. Ssiws, but it does the trick!
Did you get a chance to speak to O-Pongo and have him tell you the tale of Versalmas? If not, you should listen to it.

What does the Versalmas tale mean, you ask? The tale emphasizes strength in times of hardship, and the perseverance to do the right thing, even if all seems lost... and that you will always find others like yourself if you are focused on your goal. There is a saying in this world, "Coal turns to diamond under pressure." Never facing the pressure means you may never discover your inner nature. This is part of the spirit of Versalmas.
Happy Versalmas, again. And may your days be bright.
